Group hierarchy: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.

Just by changing the upfront payments on EC2 instances I was able to get within the budget. Other ways of getting within the budget is to reduce the number of EC2 instances and make auto scaling more prominent. Also, choosing different types
of EC2 instances in favor of burstable approach would help too.
